Enjoying my lunch at work I reached the last item in my lunchbox Creamfilled chocolate cupcakes from TastyKake PERIOD The ones with white icing drooping off the sides with a chocolate stripe down the center PERIOD

Naturally Penn States nonconference schedule came to mind PERIOD But instead of beating a dead horse criticizing the soft home dates in September and October I decided to mix it up a bit and tell yall why you should bother showing up for these noon kickoffs PERIOD

Heres some of the better talent Akron Syracuse Temple and yes Eastern Illinois will throw out to bang helmets with the Nittany Lions in the fall PERIOD

WR Deryn Bowser Akron

Penn States retooled secondary wont have to wait long to be tested PERIOD Passhappy Akron has always been known the throw the pigskin around the yard and Bowser will likely be on the receiving end of most of those this fall PERIOD At 6foot2 Bowser has size and hes bringing  catches and  yards of experience with him from last year PERIOD

FS Mike Holmes Syracuse

Remember when Daryll Clark fumbled on Penn States opening drive in the Carrier Dome a year ago That was all Mr PERIOD Holmes PERIOD He also returns kicks leading Syracuse with more than  yards and more than  yards per return in  including a TD PERIOD

DE Andre Neblett Temple

Neblett recorded . sacks and forced two fumbles for the Owls last season PERIOD Penn State is busting out three new offensive linemen in  including a brand new left tackle having to deal with Neblett PERIOD

K Austin Signor Eastern Illinois

Laugh all you want but this guy can kick the football and at 6foot4 probably your butt too PERIOD Signor ranked third in the country last year with  kickoffs going for touchbacks and he averaged about  yards per kickoff PERIOD Signor likely will be the teams place kicker as well and watch out Lion fans hes a former Iowa Hawkeye PERIOD

Mink
